RGBCamera

RGB Camera.

Description

This node is used to capture RGB images with RLAgent.

Note

This class is not expected to be changed by user.

Property Descriptions

(Vector2) viewport_size

Camera resolution in pixels.

Method Descriptions

(Image) get_data()

Return current camera frame.
